source_objects.title: Pet Care & Training
source_objects.description: Learn the best kept secrets in pet care and pet training: dogs, cats, rabbits, horses, fish and many more.

items.title: BAREFOOT BASICS
items.headline: Everything you need to know about your Barefoot Horses success!
objectives_summary: Hoof care and Hoof Health
Anatomy of the Hoof
Equine Diet & Digestion as it relates to the Hoof

items.title: Predation Substitute Training
items.headline: New Ways of Managing your Dog's Predatory Chasing.
objectives_summary: What is predation?
Why does your dog love to hunt?
Why is predation so hard to stop?

items.title: Before You Get Your Puppy ‚Äì Prepare for Puppy Training
items.headline: Ensure you're getting it right from the start, so you can relax, have fun and enjoy your puppy's homecoming.
objectives_summary: üê∂ How to prepare for your puppy's arrival so you both start off on the right paw
üê∂ What to check with the breeder before you pick your puppy up
üê∂ Puppy house-rules ‚Äî making sure everyone in the family is on the same page

items.title: Dog Training- Leash Manners for the Real World

visible_instructors.title: Nikki Ivey
visible_instructors.name: Nikki
visible_instructors.job_title: Canine Behavior Specialist and Trainer at DogSpeak

items.headline: A guide to teach walking on leash appropriately in all situations.
objectives_summary: Ability to walk their dogs on-leash in real life environments with the emphasis of getting their dog to off-leash walking.
To teach their dog appropriate manners when on-leash in the real world regardless of type of distractions.

items.title: Dog Behavior & Training Problems

visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist
visible_instructors.name: Ian

items.headline: Learn how to prevent behavior problems and promptly resolve any problems that develop
objectives_summary: Resolve all of the most common dog behavior problems, including: housesoiling, destructive chewing, excessive barking, digging, separation anxiety, no recall, running away, pulling on-leash, jumping-up and hyperactivity

items.title: Dogs; Cat; Pet As Emotional Support; Anxiety, Depression
items.headline: Learn How Dogs, Cats, and Other Pets Can Provide Emotional Support Also CBT Applications; Certificate Course
objectives_summary: Learn What A Service Animal Is
Learn About Emotional Support Animals
The Role of Guide Dogs

items.title: Sound Therapy & Energy Healing for Animals
items.headline: Healing Techniques and Tips for Happy, Healthy Pets
objectives_summary: Sound Therapy and Energy Healing for Animals Includes MP3 Healing Music for Animals
How Energy Healing Works
Balance

items.title: Turn Your Love And Passion for Animals Into A Career!
items.headline: Andrea Infante, Pet Care Service Expert, Life Coach Expert in Law of Attraction, Shamanism, and Healing.
objectives_summary: Upon finishing this course, you will be ready to begin your journey as a pet care service provider and business owner.

items.title: Dog-to-Dog Aggression (also known as dog-to-dog reactivity)
items.headline: This course is for people who have dogs that behave badly when seeing other dogs on the street, the vet's office, etc.
objectives_summary: Does your dog start to pull toward other dogs when you are walking him or her? Does your dog whine, growl, bark, lunge or just get unruly when seeing other dogs on a walk? This embarrassing behavior can be resolved with behavior modification if you understand and address the root cause.

items.title: AKC Rally Master Class
items.headline: Correct Performance, Teaching Your Dog, Footwork, Cueing, Tips for Practice, and Problem Solving
objectives_summary: Handlers will learn how to correctly perform the AKC Master exercises and how to teach the exercises to their dogs.

items.title: Dog Body Language
items.headline: How to identify it
objectives_summary: How dogs use their bodies to communicate
Subtle signs that tell you a dog is uncomfortable or stressed
How to identify stress in a dog before it turns into aggression

items.title: Dog Training; Dog Behavior; Research Backed Approach
items.headline: Dogs; Dog Training; Dog Behavior Train Your Dog Based On Researched Approaches
objectives_summary: Learn About Research That Has Been Conducted About Dog Behaviors
Learn How To Identify Your Dog's Behavior
Learn About Available Resources To Explore Your Dog's Behavior

items.title: Dog Training For Humans - How to Find Your Dogs Kryptonite
items.headline: Discover how you can find out what your dog LOVES so you can use it to play and control him off lead.
objectives_summary: Exercise your dog off lead safely and have much more control
Train your dog to listen to you even when their are other distractions around
Enjoy safe trips to the dog park with a dog that wants to be with YOU

items.title: Cat Pumping and Making DIY Toys

visible_instructors.title: Will Caraway
visible_instructors.job_title: The Networking Guru - Chief Networking Executive
visible_instructors.name: Will

items.headline: Learn how to communicate with your pets on a different level
objectives_summary: Learn different and interesting ways to communicate with your cats and your feline friends. Theses are techniques and tips I have learned over the  years having been privileged to be a guardian for some of my best four legged friends. You will learn some DIY, ( do it yourself ) projects that are fun and easy to complete. Sometimes letting your cat show you and help you make the best toys are priceless.

items.title: The Perfect Puppy Project - Perfect for inexperienced owners
items.headline: The ultimate no-mess, zero-stress, step-by-step guide to raising and home schooling the perfect puppy
objectives_summary: How to puppy proof your home
How to settle in your new puppy
How to prepare your puppy for stres-free vet visits

items.headline: A seminar on the state of dog training and behavior

Ensure every dog gets the education they deserve
